descriptive.question: What is [person_2] doing?
answer: [person_2] is paying attention to the falling ball.
[person_2] is opening the coco by hands.

explanatory.question: Why does [person_1] applause?
answer: To cheer for [person_2] successfully opening it by hands.
[person_1] likes to shake maracas to make sound.

predictive.question: What will [person_2] do next?
answer: [person_2] will introduce more about what he did.

counterfactual.question: What would happen if there was no hammer?
answer: It is hard for [person_2] to open it if the coco had not been knocked by the hammer.
The red wine would stick the blouse.
reason: Overexertion is harmful for the whole body.
There are many bottles on the table.
The coco is too hard to open only by hands.
